rule.name: INEFFICIENT_KEY_SIZE(RSA)
rule.message: Detect if the size of the key used for encryption is short.
rule.description: Detect if the size of the key used for encryption is short. If the length of the key is short, it makes the encryption algorithm weak. It is recommended to use a key of which length is at least 1024 bits for a RSA algorithm.

property.name: xpath
property.value: //BlockStatement[ Statement/StatementExpression/PrimaryExpression[ ( (: Detect an argument for initialize is less than 1024 :) (: initialize의 인자가 1024 미만인 경우 :) PrimaryPrefix/Name[ends-with(@Image, "initialize")] and PrimarySuffix/Arguments/ArgumentList/Expression/PrimaryExpression/PrimaryPrefix/Literal[@Image < 1024] ) ] and (: Detect the usage of KeyPairGenerator class in the block containing initialize :) (: initialize가 사용된 블록 내에서 KeyPairGenerator가 사용된 경우 :) ancestor::Block/BlockStatement[ LocalVariableDeclaration[Type/ReferenceType/ClassOrInterfaceType[contains(@Image, "KeyPairGenerator")]] ] ]
